column1: Comma in error msg is substituted with ^ symbol
For separating arguments in error args | symbol is used

column4: Syntax error on token "^"^ delete this token

column3: Syntax error on token ";"^ delete this token
Syntax error on token "="^ VariableInitializer expected after this token
Syntax error on token "TR"^ delete this token
Syntax error on token "float"^ delete this token
Syntax error^ insert ";" to complete FieldDeclaration
Syntax error^ insert "AssignmentOperator Expression" to complete Expression
idth cannot be resolved to a variable
wi cannot be resolved to a variable
